posts.description:
This color booster was so welcome on this gloomy morning (a cold front from Sweden arrived in Switzerland ;-). I prepped this jar yesterday and today I learned that my dear friend Klara's is holding a #klarasparfaitparty üéä What a funny coincidence {I think I head a feeling}. This one is for you lovely! Did you know that we follow each other for so many moons already? There's almost no day we do not interact with each other. She's a true gem and  I wouldn't miss one of her posts and happy meals. 
This parfait consists of blueberry-coconut cream, #cashew #chia #spirulina pudding @organicburst and crispy toppings "power fruit #granola" from my Dutch friends @royalgreen2008.

I also want to dedicate this jar to my dear friend Mari @cloudberrytales from whom my inspiration came from. 
#happybreakfast #notsponsored

Would you like one of these? Yesterday I made oat-almond and seed cookies from the latest issue @freshandlight (catch up the process in my stories). They are so good and super nourishing. Today it happened that I had some leftover chocolate sauce (don't now how that was ever possible üòÖ) and drizzled them spontaneously. They will be my life savors at work! ‚ù§Ô∏è
‚ù§Ô∏è
‚ù§Ô∏è
#chocolate #healthysnack #notponsored #freshandlight 
Chia seeds @organicburst .
#cookies #chia #almonds #f52grams #thekitchn #saveur #seasonalfood #epicurious #todayfood #beautifulcuisines #oats #onmyplate #inmykitchen #OBAmbassador #plantbased #vsco #tastyasheck

There's a new rumble in the house, called "shadow banning". If you like to read some opinions you may check my friends post's Rita @ritaserano Sara @shisodelicious Nina @nourish_atelier Marie @papaya_sunshine and Jo @healthyeating_jo (I support their point of views 100%). What I want to spread is positivity here and that's why I love to share this photo I took at a joint photo shoot with Fanny @fannythefoodie and Carrie @harrysding I would have never met these ladies without our connection on Instagram. I wouldn't know that Fanny is writing her first cookbook and Carrie shares so many interests with me. I would have never spent the most amazing #summerfoodiesinfrance where we cooked up a storm and shared our ideas, together with Rita and Sara {already mentioned above}, Olivia @adelasterfoodtextures and our #avomonday powerhouse Bettina @bettinas_kitchen. 
Two years ago Bettina and Sara organized a London meet up where I met Kimberly @thelittleplantation Samira @alphafoodie Zita @foodfightsuk and many more. 
When I travel I have the opportunity to meet even more friends since we all are strongly connected. Berlin ladies Sophie @luckystaranise and Susanna @mehlstaubundofenduft 
The Munich crew was awesome too, Kerstin @curlew_and_dragonfly (get well soon lovely) , Shabnam @thehungrywarrior Katinka @keightys Susanna @eatsleepgreen 
There are so many more that it's impossible to list them all. 
I love that all these wonderful humans and myself got amazing opportunities (jobs, collaborations) through their unique work which they display on their feeds. Last but not least I wish luck to my girl Nadia @nadiadamaso_ebnl and one of my favorite guys here Timothy @mississippivegan with their upcoming book projects. 
Sorry, I couldn't tag moreüôà
.
#sharethelove #sharethecheer #friendship #gathering #kinfolk #tablesetting #foodphotography #foodphotographer #foodstylist #fellowmag #provenciallife #diewocheaufinstagram #bloom #botanical #floweroftheday #verylimoment #eattheworld #dslooking #beautifulmatters #nothingisordinary #slowliving #thatsdarling #livethelittlethings #tastyasheck

The pink mood is back again üíò Are you in? If you watched my stories you know already what it is. I made a "beet-apple porridge" with my homemade walnut milk and warming spices (cinnamon + cardamom + vanilla). Sweetened with only one minced medjol date and it tastes like caramel. Toppings are candy beets, lilac blossoms, micro shiso leaves, organic raspberries and hemp-hearts.
Fanny @fannythefoodie how do I slice my veggies so thinly, the secret is a Japanese julienne slicer with razor sharp blades. You can go for the cheapest but be aware of your fingers üòú I got mine from a large online shop with an "A" .
It's going to be a slow and relaxing weekend and we are already chilling....
#healthybreakfast #pinklove

Happy Friday to everyone, I'm sharing a springy salad with you üíöSpiralized purple haze carrots, rucola, thinly julienned radishes, avocado, tomato and black gomasio sprinkles (inspired by Sara's @shisodelicious blogpost). Featuring another casheeze from @new__roots. This one was my absolute favorite, like a cream cheese with lots of chivesüåø
Don't forget to pick some lovely edible blossoms for your toppings ;-)
#notsponsored #dairyfree #rawvegan

Yesterday's breakkie kept me warm and nourished. Kasha porridge with oven baked rhubarb and strawberries üçì plus a dollop sweet cream (@nutritionstripped) and almond butter drizzle. Inspired by Nina's @nourish_atelier recipe from her book #bowlsofgoodness
The morning at the zoo was fab but ice cold, a few snaps in stories. We stayed in the elephant house and masoala hall (with all the plants and animals from Madagascar) for a longer time since the temperature and vegetation is tropical in here. So much fun and now tired from so many impressions.

My fave wisteria went a bit hysteria today (check stories ;-) Hope you guys are doing fine. I did exactly what I didn't want to but ate all the chocolate I decorated today, if you wanna know about my contribution to Quentin Tarantinos splatter movies you'll see some on my stories or even cooler pics on Carrie's @harrysding
No I'm ready for sweet dreams (yeah sweet indeed) to be prepared at for a day at the zoo with my godson tmrwü¶ÅüêØüêªüêí bye!

Springy pizza to brighten the eveüåø Toppings are, purple rucola, pink beet humus, local asparagus, shaved radishes, black grilled babaganoush, casheeze and mustard microgreens. 
Happy hump dayüíü
#pizza #eattherainbow

Sticky rice with pineapple and coconut shreds. I was so lucky to have some leftover black rice from my poke bowl the other day. Cooked the rice slowly with coconut milk and coconut sugar @royalgreen2008 until it turned into a pudding. So lush, with the juicy pineapple and shreds on top. Served these little jars at my Easter brunch and guess what, they were inhaled pretty quickly.
Plate by @mylifeisdelicious ‚≠êÔ∏è

I'm in love with mochi rice üçö I added homemade strawberry-cashew milk and topped it with a good dollop PB, soaked goji berries, goji-coconut chocolate @pana_chocolate toasted coconut shreds and lilac blossoms (from neighbors garden, shush, don't tell...)
This day was filled with laughter. We invited friends with my godson over for a yummy brunch {details in stories}. Walked over fields and into the woods. Flew with a drone (mavikpro) over local ponds and felt that a cold breeze is coming over. Back home we warmed ourself with organic rooibos tea and ate the yummy banana muffins from Sophie's @wholeheartedeats blog. So good!
